criteria: Vendor Registration API contract is finalized and deployed to dev; Frontend can successfully call the registration endpoint.
success_metrics: Successful E2E registration of a test vendor in the dev environment.

criteria: Security scan of OpenSearch configuration complete; SAST scan on authentication code shows no critical vulnerabilities.

criteria: WebSocket server sustains 10,000 concurrent connections; P95 latency for location updates is under 2 seconds.
success_metrics: All performance NFRs for live tracking are met under simulated load.
